body_html:
unfortunately, i am not able to reproduce this.
I've done a fresh install of 16.04 on an amazon ec2 instance and freshly installed CUDA8.
the default gcc shipped is 5.4.0

pytorch installed and ran unit tests smoothly.

I will add a note to the README.md's Install from source section just warning about a possible issue.

body:
unfortunately, i am not able to reproduce this.
I've done a fresh install of 16.04 on an amazon ec2 instance and freshly installed CUDA8.
 the default gcc shipped is 5.4.0

pytorch installed and ran unit tests smoothly.

I will add a note to the README.md's Install from source section just warning about a possible issue.
